Plot: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.
Title: Cold Creek Manor
Actors: Dennis Quaid, Sharon Stone, Stephen Dorff, Juliette Lewis
tomatoConsensus: The plot of Cold Creek Manor is too predictable and contrived to generate suspense.
